namebody:
"Bug_report"": "B001" "Profile module: button 'Share stories in Instagram' is disable when clicking on it" "Tango mobile app. Android 8.0.0" "R05" "Button 'Instagram History' does not react to pressing, nothing is opened" "Popup window is opened to make next step for sharing on Instagram app"
"1.In the 'My profile' tab, click on the profile icon" 2.In the window that is opened select the icon 'Share with' 3.Press on button 'Instagram Stories'"
"major" "Low" "_" "_"
